snippet: Tuesday’s highlights from around the web include how Netflix has managed to succeed without carrying top movies. Plus, Fab’s chief executive gets introspective about dreaming in billions of dollars before he even earned them.
abstract: Tuesday’s highlights from around the web include how Netflix has managed to succeed without carrying top movies. Plus, Fab’s chief executive gets introspective about dreaming in billions of dollars before he even earned them.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Netflix's Dumbed-Down Algorithms and Fab's Introspection
